reviewText:
This is really such a wild story, and I'm glad Gruff Rhys from the Super Furry Animals brought it to life in stunning fashion.

It's amazing that a Welsh explorer searching for Welsh-speaking Native American tribes laid the groundwork for Lewis & Clark's famous expedition.

This film is a real treat.
A wild ride. A great way to experience a forgotten piece of history! Great story. Thanks, Gruff, I ordered the book, CD, and movie!
